actions.title: Generate Arlington HTML Report
actions.name: arlington_html_validation_report
actions.desc: Automatically checks grammar in a PDF using the Arlington PDF Model
actions.program: docker run --platform linux/amd64 -v "${working_directory}:/data" --rm pdfix/validate-pdf-arlington:latest validate --format html --input "/data/${input_pdf}" --output "/data/${output_html}"

args.name: max_failures
args.desc: Limits the number of checked failures, and if set to -1, the entire document is checked

args.name: max_failures_displayed
args.desc: Maximum number of failures to display. If set to -1, all failures are displayed
